column2: SELECT p.objid, p.ra, p.dec,p.dered_u,p.dered_g,p.dered_r,p.dered_i,p.dered_z,p.clean,p.flags                 , z.z as photoz,z.zErr as photozErr, s.specObjID as specObjID,s.z as specz,s.zErr as speczErr                 , dbo.fPhotoFlagsN(p.flags) as note                 FROM GALAXY as p                 LEFT OUTER JOIN photoz as z ON z.objID = p.objID                 LEFT OUTER JOIN specObjAll as s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID                 , dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(#,#,#) n                  WHERE p.objID = n.objID                 and p.petroRad_r >#  ---bright problem                 and p.dered_r <# and dered_r >#                 and p.dered_i <#                 and p.dered_z <#                 and (flags & dbo.fPhotoFlags(&&&)) = #
